mapper.sql: id, parentid, tid, file_name, file_path, createtime, fabu_type, yuliu,updateTime,createName,updateName
mapper.select:
select
from mro_zhishiguanli_filetype_file
parentid=#{id}
and file_name like concat('%',#{fileName},'%')
group by id desc

select
from mro_zhishiguanli_filetype_file
file_name like concat('%',#{fileName},'%')
and tid =#{id}
group by id desc
